addition.26: * An implementation-specific parameter class suitable for initializing {@link
addition.27: * ArrayBasedCharEscaper} or {@link ArrayBasedUnicodeEscaper} instances. This class should be used
addition.28: * when more than one escaper is created using the same character replacement mapping to allow the
addition.29: * underlying (implementation specific) data structures to be shared.
